text: Enywe Abasuubila mulakhola Abasuku banje nende Abasuku benyu okhuba abeetsa , bamwachama tawe, netoto bamala okhukhaya abwatoto bwamwitsila, bekalilanga Omurumwa nende enywe okhusuubila khu Nyasaye Omulesi wenyu, Olwamurulanga khulwa okhulwaana khunjila yanje, nende okhukhaaba tsimbabaasi tsianje, mukholanga nabo obwitsa mubwifisi, nasi amanyile muno kamukhola mubwifisi nende mubwang’ang’u, ne ukhola ario mwinywe aba yamala okhukora injila ya habwene
